name: CubeNinja
description:
We created this part of GameTime 2017, Tampere in a week and hope everyone can enjoy our awesome infinite runner.

How to play:
Press LEFT -mouse button to change direction of movement.

Goal:

-Collect 9999 points to get your fathers approval to become a real ninja.
-Don't drop from the path.
-SURVIVE!

Music by mrthenoronha
